name: Eyfastr Sverrirson
title: none
description:
You run into a fellow traveller on his horse's back, with a huge bundle.
The traveller is a tall and commanding presence , with short curly red hair and beautiful green eyes.
The young man also has a sharp beard.
The Norse looks at you with contempt.

name: Zaynab Al Husseinyad
title: none
description:
You've been hearing the rythmic clang of a hammer by afar, now you see a blacksmith working her craft.
The blacksmith is a an absolute beast of a lady , with short straight black hair and jarring blue eyes.
This old Alnaasi looks at you with respect. Maybe she has a job you could do for a fair price.

A man stands in front of you, holding a spear, his armor is rusty, his boots are muddy.
The soldier is a short old man , with long curly platinum hair and jarring blue eyes.
The old man also has a sharp beard.
The Daoine looks at you with contempt.

name: Salma Al Omaryad
title: none
description:
Here an innkeeper sits, with her apron dirty, outside her tavern.
The innkeeper is a giant of a lady , with short curly blonde hair and piercing red eyes.
The Alnaasi innkeeper sees you, she seems like she wants to ask you something. Perhaps she has a job for you.

name: Ali Al Faridyad
title: none
description:
You run into a fellow traveller on his horse's back, with a huge bundle.
The traveller is a giant of a man , with short straight chestnut hair and jarring brown eyes.
The middle-aged man also has a slender moustache.
The Alnaasi traveller seems kinda suspicious of you. You should be careful not to provoke him any more.

name: Ros Ó Fearghasi
title: none
description:
Here an innkeeper sits, with her apron dirty, outside her tavern.
The innkeeper is a towering figure , with long curly black hair and jarring chestnut eyes.
The Daoine looks at you with contempt.

name: Caoimhe Ó Fearghasi
title: none
description:
A merchant has set up her counter here.
The merchant is a tiny lady , with long straight black hair and jarring brown eyes.
The Daoine merchant seems kinda suspicious of you. You should be careful not to provoke her any more.

name: Helga Oleifrdottir
title: none
description:
You've been hearing the rythmic clang of a hammer by afar, now you see a blacksmith working her craft.
The blacksmith is a an absolute beast of a lady , with long straight chestnut hair and piercing green eyes.
The Norse blacksmith seems kinda suspicious of you. You should be careful not to provoke her any more.
